biotools.summary:
TRIAGE - T hroughput R anking by I terative A nalysis of G enomic E nrichment.
A web-based iterative analysis platform integrating pathway and network approaches optimizes hit selection from high-throughput assays.

The Throughput Ranking by Iterative Analysis of Genomic Enrichment (TRIAGE) platform is designed to facilitate robust hit selection from high-throughput studies.
